answers.answer: I'm sorry you're having such a bad time at the minute. You can't get an STD without having some kind of sexual activity ie intercourse or oral sex and as you said you haven't then you don't have an STD. I think a trip to your doctor to try and explaine your depression would be a good idea and no need to worry about having to tell him about any STDs. Maybe you should try posting in the depression forum as well. You're not alone.

question: I am very deppressed, I am 15 years old, my parents are splitting up, my mum may have breast cancer, my dad has diabetes and has had a heart attack, I have an STD although i havent had sex, i am getting back problems, gaining weight and I am getting chest pains, can someone please tell me what to do please i dont know what STD it is as i havent been to the doctors because im too nervous. thank you for your time
title: deppression and medical issues
